resources.string: This photo symbolizes my interest in watching anime. Katekyo Hitman Reborn is the title of the anime portrayed in this image. At that time, I was\'nt into anime that much. It was my first loved anime ever.

This photo shows my interest in cats. Yes, I may be a stone-hearted man, but I like cats, especially when they are fluffy and cute. I never had a cat before, and hoping that in the future, will get one.

Computer Science! My beloved course. I might not be the greatest among ComSci students, but I believe that one day, I\'ll be able to design software efficiently, and work with Robotics, aka. Machine Learning.

This picture was taken 3 years ago, at the time when I was a Senior High School student. We ate at Dad\'s Buffet since it was my Aunt\'s birthday. This photo is not the totality of my family, but I sure had a wholesome moment with them.

We are HERMES! This photo is just my edited version from the original photoshoot. We participated in the HCI Ideathon 2019 as the group name \"Hermes\", with our concept, \"Talaria\", a bug-like robot designed for Disaster Risk Management.

Here are my loving parents. My mom, Eden on the left, and my dad, Jaime on the right. This photo was taken I guess 4 years ago, at the Patapat Bridge, Ilocos Norte. At this particular moment, we are on the way to Vigan City. Adventurer!

Cuties! Siberian Husky is the cutest dog breed ever! (That\'s just a personal preference). But seriously, I would love to take care of one, but at this moment, I\'m living in a rented apartment and is busy in academic works, therefore, I have no time. Poor me.

This photo right here is my current laptop, Dell Inspiron 15 7577. I bought this laptop last October 31, 2019 (one day after my Dad\'s Birthday). Since I\'m into ComSci, I definitely love computers and passionate about them. Hoping this laptop lasts long. Yey!

Hungry? Grab a chicken. Yes, this one right here is my beloved Fried Chicken. I like all kinds of Fried Chicken out there, and never resisted once. There are still preferences, like Jollibee\'s chicken is better than McDo, but most of the time, I but at Ministop. LOL.

You dare invite me to a milk tea? I will never refuse. This one right here is my favorite beverage, the \"Milk Tea\", ladies and gentlemen. My favorite flavor is Wintermelon, and I am proud to say that I am a Milk Tea Taster.
